body:
Robert Graham wrote:


> I'm trying to compile the 3R1P8 version form the Radsite wep page.  I'll try
> and get to those Linux binaries.  Thanks for the advice.




In the same directory as the binaries, there are also the
sources to 3R1P20. The version P8 is out of date and does
indeed cause problems when compiling on recent (ie. less
than three years old) Linux systems.




Have fun!


-schorsch




Georg Mischler  --  simulations developer  --  schorsch at schorsch.com
+schorsch.com+  --  lighting design tools  --  http://www.schorsch.com/
